title: Build a Birdhouse
description: A project to construct a wooden birdhouse for your backyard.

details.title: Gather Materials
details.detail: Collect all necessary tools and wood for the birdhouse.

details.title: Cut and Assemble
details.detail: Cut the wood into pieces and assemble the birdhouse structure.

details.title: Paint and Decorate
details.detail: Paint the birdhouse and add decorative elements.

title: Learn TypeScript
description: A step-by-step guide to mastering TypeScript for JavaScript developers.

details.title: Setup Development Environment
details.detail: Install Node.js and set up a TypeScript compiler.

details.title: Learn Basic Types
details.detail: Understand and use basic TypeScript types like string, number, and boolean.

details.title: Advanced Features
details.detail: Learn about interfaces, generics, and advanced TypeScript features.

title: Bake a Cake
description: A simple recipe to bake a delicious chocolate cake.

details.title: Prepare Ingredients
details.detail: Measure and prepare all the ingredients needed for the cake.

details.title: Mix Batter
details.detail: Combine ingredients to make the cake batter.

details.title: Bake and Decorate
details.detail: Bake the cake and decorate with frosting and toppings.
